intro_text1: Hi, I am a frontend developer from Stade, Germany. To improve my web development skills, I attended an extensive programming school, where I also learned professional ways of working in programming.
intro_text2: Meanwhile, I developed various web apps, from responsive websites to business apps and games. You are welcome to visit and test my projects.
content_text1: After years of experience as a master baker, I transitioned into a Frontend Web Developer with passion and determination. My extensive background instilled discipline, precision, and quality, easily transferring to web development.
content_text2: Through self-study and practical projects, I became proficient in programming languages like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with frameworks like Angular and React. My portfolio includes diverse web applications developed independently or collaboratively.
content_text3: I excel at blending creativity with industry requirements, crafting innovative designs while adhering to best practices. In summary, I am a versatile and imaginative web developer, adept at meeting project requirements and deadlines.
content_text4: This blend of skills and experiences positions me well to excel in the industry, delivering exceptional digital solutions.
skills_text: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.
portfolio_text: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
join_desc: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize task using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories. This project was developed by group work.
pokedex_desc: Based on the PokéAPI a simple libary that provides and catalogues Pokémon information. A fun project to learn the mechanations of using an API.
halloween_desc: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Play Pepe Peligroso and defeat the dangerous Chicken swarm!
contact_text2: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
check_text3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
